title: Bobby’s Girlfriend Wants To Buy Something Controversial + Amy’s Son Got Pulled Over + Famous Blondes Draft!
itunes:title: Bobby’s Girlfriend Wants To Buy Something Controversial + Amy’s Son Got Pulled Over + Famous Blondes Draft!
description:
Bobby’s girlfriend Caitlin came on the show today to talk about what she wants to get his dog Stanley for their family walks. The show weighs in on if it’s a good idea or not. Amy’s son got recognized by a police officer who stopped him while he was riding his bike. We do our Bobby Bones Show draft of famous blondes! Vote at www.BobbyBones.com for your favorite team! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
